typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(DEPTNO=='10',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DEPT10, DEPTALL)
ConditionalSplit1@DEPT10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DEPT10'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTALL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DEPTALL'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> srcEMP
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> srcDEPT
srcEMP, srcDEPT join(srcEMP@DEPTNO == srcDEPT@Deptno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(srcEMP@DEPTNO=='10') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sort(desc(EMPNO, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		name as string,
		location as string,
		satellites as string[],
		goods as (trade as boolean, customers as string[], orders as (orderId as string, orderTotal as double, shipped as (orderItems as (itemName as string, itemQty as string)[]))[])
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(satellites),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		satellites,
		goods
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 foldDown(unroll(goods.customers),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		satellites,
		trade = goods.trade,
		customers = goods.customers,
		orders = goods.orders
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 foldDown(unroll(orders),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		satellites,
		trade,
		customers,
		orderId = orders.orderId,
		orderTotal = orders.orderTotal,
		shipped = orders.shipped
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Flatten3 foldDown(unroll(shipped.orderItems),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		location,
		satellites,
		trade,
		customers,
		orderId,
		orderTotal,
		itemName = shipped.orderItems.itemName,
		itemQty = shipped.orderItems.itemQty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten4
Flatten4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'gen2storage',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	partitionFileNames:['JSON_FLATTEN'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@DEPTNO == source2@Deptno,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['left_join'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 rank(desc(SAL, true),
	output(RANK as long)) ~> Rank1
Rank1 rank(desc(SAL, true),
	output(DENSE_RANK as long),
	dense: true) ~> Rank2
Rank2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['RANKING'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsrc
empsrc window(over(JOBNAME = JOB),
	desc(toInteger(SAL), true),
	RANK = rank(),
		DENSE_RANK = denseRank(),
		LEAD = lead(SAL),
		LAG = lag(SAL),
		CUMM_SAL = sum(toInteger(SAL))) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['window.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(JOB),
	sum_salary = sum(toInteger(SAL)),
		max_sal = max(toInteger(SAL))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['aggregateemp1'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsrc
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptsrc
empsrc, deptsrc lookup(empsrc@DEPTNO == deptsrc@Deptno,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(TOTAL_SALARY = toInteger(SAL)+iifNull(toInteger(COMM),0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		EMPNO,
		FULL_NAME = ENAME,
		JOB,
		MGR,
		HIREDATE,
		DEPTNO = empsrc@DEPTNO,
		Deptno = deptsrc@Deptno,
		Dname,
		Loc,
		TOTAL_SALARY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(groupBy(JOB),
	pivotBy(DEPTNO),
	SAL = sum(toInteger(SAL)),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PIVOTOUTPUT'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		order_number as string,
		customer as string,
		apple as string,
		banana as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 unpivot(output(
		NEW as string,
		QUANTITY as string
	),
	ungroupBy(order_number,
		customer),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['UNPIVOT.TXT'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
